author: Siobhan Neela-Stock
title: 6 ways to help loved ones grieving deaths during the coronavirus pandemic
description: For many of us, the coronavirus is a waiting game. Since mid-March when I started working from home and limiting trips out of my apartment, I've crossed out each day on my calendar. Each "X" represented a victory, marking another day that I escaped the virus'…
